name: Tempo ™
summary:
TEMPO - A simple but challenging take on the cinematic action game, where you hit, swipe, and tap your way to victory, following onscreen prompts in timed bursts of action events. * PLAY OFFLINE & WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASES *

Liberate London and take the city back! Test your reflexes in cinematic bursts of action as you race against time to stop a psychopath and his shady army. Are you quick enough to save the city?

WarChest is proud to present an explosive pick-up-and-play experience from the award-winning developer Splash Damage.
info:
• 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: TPS
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015.02.12
  • 售价: 4.99$
  • 官方网站: http://www.playtempo.com
